mapper.sql: CPR_ID, CPR_ENTID, CPR_ENTNAME, CPR_ENTTYPE, CPR_PROTYPE, CPR_PRONO, CPR_PROMODELNO, CPR_CERTNO, CPR_QUETYPE, CPR_QUEINCPR, CPR_CHECKTIME, CPR_CHECKTIMENEXT, CPR_CHECKTADDR, CPR_PRONAME, CPR_CHECKUSER, CPR_CHECKRESULT, CPR_ENTBUILD, CPR_SHIPCODE, CPR_SHIPNAME

select
distinct
from CIS_PRODUCT_REPAIR
order by ${orderByClause}

CPR_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select:
select count(*) from cis_product_repair t,cis_entinfo a where t.cpr_entid = a.ce_registnum and a.ce_entcate = #{type} and t.cpr_checktime like #{year}
and a.ce_orgcode like #{like}
